subject: feat(query): add boolean logic to query engine (AND/OR/NOT with grouping)
body:
Rewrote query engine with recursive-descent parser supporting boolean
operators. Queries like `label:Person OR label:Company NOT status:Done`
and parenthetical grouping `(label:Task OR label:Docs) status:Done`
now work. Backward-compatible with existing token syntax.

Tags: phase-5, query, parser, boolean-logic
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: medium
Debt: paid
Epic: product-realignment
Semver: minor

https://claude.ai/code/session_01MJJT4w8YukfxVmCpcMZeZB
title: add boolean logic to query engine (AND/OR/NOT with grouping)
